item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Napoli 'aggressively pushing' for Man United's Mainoo
item.description: A midseason move for Manchester United midfielder Kobbie Mainoo is in Napoli's sights. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Bucks back Turner with win after ex-Pacer booed

item.title: Morant mum on feelings after return from ban
item.description: Grizzlies star Ja Morant returned from his one-game suspension and had 18 points and 10 assists in a loss to the Pistons.
